creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LLC, in pencil: [5277]; on verso, LRC, in pencil: [M.B. Walker]
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, Minnesota.  The Garmezys do not recall how they acquired these etchings.
signed: below image, in pencil: [Trial Proof  Frank Short]; ULC in the plate, in black: [A Lane In Arundel]
text: In this touched proof, Frank Short used white paint to cover various areas of the image he wished to change in the next state. Careful attention to the adjacent etching reveals where the artist has gone back to the plate and removed lines and modified the composition.
title: A Lane in Arundel
